text.__SUMMARY__: Millettia decipiens is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Millettia decipiens". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31549A9642019. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31549A9642019.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
